TEXT.TITLE: THAILAND'S FOREIGN RESERVES FALL IN FEBRUARY
TEXT.BODY: Thailand's foreign reserves of gold, special drawing rights and convertible currencies fell to 3.86 billion dlrs at end-February from 3.95 billion the previous month, but were above the 3.08 billion held at the same time last year, the Bank of Thailand said. It said the reserves were equal to about five months' worth of imports. REUTER
